sources.title: Dinner at the Ritz
sources.description: Title: Dinner at the Ritz Summary: The daughter of a murdered financier is working as a jewelry salesperson while she tracks those among her father's colleagues who plotted against him. Directed by: Harold D. Schuster Actors: Production Company: New World Pictures Ltd. Release Date: 26 November 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 The daughter of a murdered financier is working as a jewelry salesperson while she tracks those among her father's colleagues who plotted against him.

sources.title: Dinner At The Ritz
sources.description: In this sophisticated whodunit, a French woman teams with a British agent to expose the culprits who made her father's murder look like a suicide. TRIVIA: French actress Annabella was the first wife of Tyrone Power.

sources.title: Dinner at the Ritz (1937) DAVID NIVENüçï ANNABELLA
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Annabella, David Niven, Paul Lukas, Francis L. Sullivan
Screenplay: Roland Pertwee
Director: Harold D. Schuster

In this sophisticated whodunit, a French woman teams with a British agent to expose the culprits who made her father's murder look like a suicide.

TRIVIA: French actress Annabella was the first wife of Tyrone Power.

metadata.Plot: The daughter of a murdered financier is working as a jewelry salesperson while she tracks those among her father's colleagues who plotted against him.
